effect_entries.effect: Whenever this Pokémon's stats would be raised, they are instead lowered by the same amount, and vice versa.
When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its grass-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Strengthens grass moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.
